lines:
1956

Angola

gola Ind.

Feb 1, 1912. 
My dear Mr. Shans,

Your favor of 
the 29th. reached me dach 
befon yesterday. I do not know 
hon to thank you for your 
Kind advice. Really my 
draft to not enough to

cover my expenses, if I 
send all of what you stated 
in the letter. Following your 
kind instruction dan nou 
enclosing a draft of two
raw: 1956  Angola  gola Ind.  Feb 1, 1912.  My dear Mr. Shans,  Your favor of  the 29th. reached me dach  befon yesterday. I do not know  hon to thank you for your  Kind advice. Really my  draft to not enough to  cover my expenses, if I  send all of what you stated  in the letter. Following your  kind instruction dan nou  enclosing a draft of two

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter with partial remittance of $150 and thanks for Stearns' advice. Luk notes that families are fleeing the area near his home.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
